body: If you follow the Taimanin series then you know that this scientist is obsessed with Murasaki. So this whole thing was probably just to lure her in.  And it worked.  Still, this gets a 6/10. Not enough Rinko still...but that last page with Murasaki is pretty good. The rest isn't bad, I'm just not a big fan of Yukikaze.
this doujin ts too good to be just  to have 22 pages
